name: The Dork Forest
bio: Jackie Kashian discusses favorite obsessions with the obsessed. Video games, Comic Books, Birdwatching. How deep in the dork forest are you? Celebrate it and f*&%$, make it your own! Portland is a HOTBED of dorks. I found a local dork luminary - Keith Baker (world creator for Dungeons and Dragons). What's HIS dorkdom? The NBA? How weird would that be? Come.
